tooltip.materials_integration.hold_shift: ยง7Hold Shift for more information
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line1: Can be placed as dirt-type blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line2: Can be used to craft various dirt-related building materials in the Sorting Workbench
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line3: Some materials exempt from Silk Touch and special crafting requirements
tooltip.materials_integration.dirt.line4: The Builder and Miner of the colony can process it directly
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line1: Can be placed as log blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line2: Can be used as logs in crafting recipes
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line3: Can be used to craft various logs in the Sorting Workbench
tooltip.materials_integration.log.line4: Most craftsmen in the colony can process it directly
tooltip.materials_integration.planks.lin: Can be placed as plank blocks
Can be used as planks in crafting recipes
Can be used to craft various wooden building materials in the Sorting Workbench
The colony's Carpenter can use it to craft almost all wooden products
tooltip.materials_integration.rock.line1: Can be placed as stone brick blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.rock.line3: Can be used to craft various stone and stone brick building materials in the Sorting Workbench
tooltip.materials_integration.rock.line4: The colony's Stonemason can process it directly
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line1: Can be placed as sand-type blocks
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line2: Can be used to craft Sand, Red Sand, and Gravel in the Sorting Workbench
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line3: Can be smelted into Glass faster
tooltip.materials_integration.sand.line4: The colony's Stonemason and Builder can directly process it to craft Sandstone
tooltip.materials_integration.stone.line: Can be placed as most stone-type blocks
Can be used as Cobblestone in crafting recipes
Can be used to craft various stone building materials in the Sorting Workbench
The colony's Stonemason can use it to craft almost all stone products
tooltip.materials_integration.fuel.line1: Can be crafted from Agricultural and Forestry Waste, Logs, or Log Resources
tooltip.materials_integration.fuel.line2: Can also be crafted from Coal and Charcoal
tooltip.materials_integration.fuel.line4: The colony's Forester can craft it
tooltip.materials_integration.waste.line: Dropped additionally from Leaves and Weeds
Can also be crafted using Leaves, Weeds, and Sticks
Can also be crafted from Farmer's Delight Straw and Tree Bark
Can be used to craft Paper and Fuel Resource
